task_prompt: Find and read the book "Notre-Dame de Paris" on Douban Read
send_prompt:

Your goal now is to manipulate a computer screen, video width: 1024, video height: 768, the overall mission is: "Find and read the book "Notre-Dame de Paris" on Douban Read".

We have developed an implementation plan for this overall mission:

    2. Click Search button.

    3. Type "Notre-Dame de Paris" into the search bar.

    4. Click on the book "Notre-Dame de Paris" from the search results.

    5. Click the Read button

    6. Read the book "Notre-Dame de Paris" on Douban Read.
